title: Spending
text:
Here you can see the expenditures of political parties in the lead-up to the elections according to the latest data.

14 okt - 12 nov 20236 nov - 12 nov 2023


During this period, political parties spent a total of ₹10,227,495 and displayed 11388 advertisements on Meta.
